verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Your foes will one day bow before your throne
and on that day they will declare you as king
it does not matter what they say or do now
as for me I will praise you Lord

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Who no go know say
You be king of Kings
Who no go know say you be Lord of Lord's - 2x

verse.name: v1c
verse.lines:
Every knee shall bow to you LORD
Every tongue confess you're LORD, today
Jesus, I confess you as LORD
